Legislative History of Laws

For Law 17-131, see notes following § 48-844.01.

DC CODE § 48-844.02

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: "Pharmaceutical product" shall have the same meaning as provided in § 3- 1201.02(10A)(B)(iii).
"Practice of pharmaceutical detailing" shall have the same meaning as provided in § 3-1201.02(10A).
